messages.subject: Samurai Fiction 2005 - all entries
messages.msgSnippet: Here you will find all of the entries for the 2005 Samurai History contest, down in the fiction section: http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html
messages.messageBody:
Here you will find all of the entries for the 2005 Samurai History
contest, down in the "fiction" section:

http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html

Congrats to all.

And as a message to the people who's stories are posted there, if you
want anything added or changed, i.e. biographies, your name, email
links, notes, etc. Let me know offlist, and I'll update it for you.
